name: Make It Red (itch)
description:
Red is the supperior color !  We need you to propagate it within the whole world.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls

Move:  Arrows

Select an option : Cursor

Instructions  Actions

- You can move tile by tile.

- When you step on a green tile it becomes red!

How to win?

- If all the green tiles became red you win.

- But if you step on a red tile you loose.

The 5 tile types

Black tile: An impassable wall

Green tile: Becomes red when stepped on

Red tile:  Stepping on it means game over_

Blue tile: Becomes green when stepped on

T-tile :  Stepping on a T-tile teleports you to the second T-tile of the level
